name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner Special Box
overview: This special edition of Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner includes the game itself, an expanded manual with liner notes and extra information on each character, as well as two bonus CDs. The first one is the individually released Devil Summoner: Akuma Zensho, a companion disc for the game that includes new artwork and expanded information on all creatures and locations in the game, while the second is a mini-CD with arranged music tracks and commentary audio by the developers.
